TITLE: Student Progress Records
DEF: Documents of a student's academic journey used for gauging the achievement of educational objectives across a large scope
TASK: The Student Progress Files pattern documents a learner's academic journey, inclusive of their accomplishments, assessments, and feedback. The pattern's purpose centers on fostering continuous improvement, self-reflection, and goal-setting. To optimize the pattern, educators need to ensure the accuracy of records, provide timely feedback, and encourage learners to engage in self-reflection and setting goals.
